Title: A master worker ascends the dais
Designer: Nanjing Chemical Industry System Workers' Art Creation Study Group (南京市化工系统工人艺术创作学习班)
Publisher: Jiangsu renmin chubanshe (江苏人民出版社)
Notes: A master worker "speaks bitterness", recounting life in pre-PRC society.On the blackboard: 第一课 - 我的卖身契 (First lesson - My deed of indenture).On the paper the man is crumbling: 卖身 (literally: sell oneself into slavery).A similar image is E37/184, but on that one, the Mao badge is absent.
